AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: psychically gifted
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was born with a greater awareness of the unseen. After many years of guidance from the tribes Wise Woman, [PAWN_pronoun] learnt how to harness [PAWN_possessive] gift, and hear the whispers of the spirits.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: stone-thrower
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was always throwing stones around, at trees, at mudcrabs, and sometimes even at [PAWN_possessive] fellow tribe members. While most of the other tribe members grew quite terrified of a stone hitting them from out of nowhere, some saw the value in [PAWN_nameDef]'s skills.
